description.value: The nosferatu can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Haul]{Telekinetic Haul} (heightened to half their level rounded up) three times per day and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vampiric Exsanguination]{Vampiric Exsanguination} twice per day as a divine innate spell. They use a high DC for their level.
